---
title: "Converting between seurat and anndata"
output: html_notebook
---
 
install and import the sceasy library
```{r}
# install sceasy, reticulate and Seurat

devtools::install_github("cellgeni/sceasy", dependencies = FALSE)
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
  install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install(c("LoomExperiment", "SingleCellExperiment"))

install.packages("reticulate")
```

```{r}
library(sp)
library(Seurat)
library(sceasy)
library(reticulate)
```

Load the dataset
```{r}

# Load the datasets
Tcell_singleR <- readRDS("CCT5001-CCT5019-T_cells-singleR-500.rds")

```

Convert using sceasy
```{r}
sceasy::convertFormat(Tcell_singleR, from="seurat", to="anndata",
                      outFile='Test2-T_cells-singleR-500.h5ad')
```
